output:
<%

for (var i = 0; i < order.length; i++){
  printer = order[i][0];
%>
  <ticket printer = "<%= printer %>">
<%
  	for (var j = 0; j < order[i][1].length; j++) {
  		
%>
        
  			Product Code: <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order[i][1][j][0]) %>		
        Quantity: <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order[i][1][j][2].toString()) %>    <%
          if(!(order[i][1][j][3] == "")){
        %>
        Description: <%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(order[i][1][j][3]) %>    
        <%    
          }
        %>
        
<%	
  		
  	}
%>
    
  

  <%
}
  %>
